full_description:
Udfine Watch Starry Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch

The Udfine Watch Starry is a state-of-the-art Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch that seamlessly combines style and functionality. Its standout feature is the impressive 1.8-inch HD display, vibrant and expansive, ensuring clarity in any lighting condition. Experience the convenience of making and receiving calls directly from your wrist, thanks to the Udfine Watch Starry's built-in microphone and speaker for Bluetooth calling. Enriching your daily life, this smartwatch integrates Amazon Alexa, allowing you to effortlessly control your music, obtain directions, set alarms, and more using just your voice. The Udfine Watch Starry is equipped with 50 meters of water resistance, making it suitable for wear in the shower or pool. The double straps included provide a touch of personalization, allowing you to choose the one that best complements your style. Whether you're navigating your day, staying connected, or enhancing your fashion ensemble with the Udfine Watch Starry.

1.8" PANDA Glass Touch Display

High quality displays of Watch Starry vibrant and lifelike graphics that are so engrossing that you will never want to look away. It has a sensitive touch that allows you to control the watch with ease.

Bluetooth Calling To Free Your Hands

Connect Udfine Watch Starry to your smartphone via Bluetooth while exercising, doing housework, or cooking, and enjoy the ease of seeing call history, answering and rejecting calls on the watch. You will never miss a vital communication with the Udfine Starry.

300mAh Battery Capacity

The Battery capacity of Udfine Watch Starry is 300mAh. With a lengthy capacity, a standby time of up to 35 days and a working time of more than 7 days.

Support 100+ Sport Modes

There is something for everyone, whether you prefer outdoor or indoor workouts. Udfine Watch Starry has 100+ professional workout modes such as walking, jogging, cycling, swimming, yoga, and dancing, as well as high-level Starryness tracking with tailored assistance. You may also choose your favorite workouts from one of the 100 customizable training modes to keep you busy and engaged.

All-Round Non-Stop Care

The watch can track your sleep to help you establish a sleep schedule, monitor your heart rate, control your breathing, and relieve stress. Watch Starry also keeps track of your menstrual cycle and physical issues, allowing you to unwind and enjoy life.

24/7 SPO2 Monitor

Blood oxygen saturation (SpO2) is a key vita indicator that can represent the body's oxygen supply. Monitoring blood oxygen saturation is especially important for persons who engage in high-intensity physical or mental workouts. Automatically detects 24-hour SpO2 levels regardless of whether you are working, exercising, or sleeping, preserving your health around the Watch Starry.

full_description:
Udfine Watch Gear Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch

The Udfine Watch Gear Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch is equipped with a heart rate monitor that has been benchmarked using the Polar heart rate belt. It can track your heart rate 24/7, allowing you to see changes at a glance. When your heart rate is elevated, notifications will be sent, protecting your health around the clock. The Udfine Watch Gear Smart Watch tracks your daily health statistics, such as heart rate, fitness, and sleep, and displays them in depth to present a clear picture of your health. You can also incorporate numerous health plans to practice self-discipline. The professional optical oximetry sensor detects your blood oxygen saturation and alerts you when it falls below a certain level, keeping your health in mind at all times. The professional optical oximetry sensor detects your blood oxygen saturation and alerts you when it falls below a certain level, keeping a close eye on your health.

2.01-inch Large HD Touch Display

The new ultra-large and iridescent 2.01" HD display on the Udfine Watch Gear Smart Watch delivers rich colors, crisp display, and beautiful vision. The 1.8-inch display lets you see everything at a glance, from message notifications to workout data.

Stable Bluetooth Voice Calls

﻿The Bluetooth call capability has a functioning time of 6 days and a call distance of 20 meters. The Udfine Watch Gear Smartwatch features ENC environmental noise reduction algorithm technology, resulting in noise-free calls and a sound frequency of 55Khz, similar to Huawei watches.

Voice Assistant on Your Hand

Udfine has entered into a global strategic partnership with Amazon Alexa voice assistant, which is an Amazon Vendor Services (AVS) authorized by Amazon Partner. Alexa, like Apple's Siri, can let you check the weather, set a timer or alarm, start exercise, view exercise and health data, set up and control your watch, and even control smart gadgets in your house.

Stay Connected with Smart Features

The Udfine Watch Gear will alert you to any messages or incoming calls, as well as programmed alerts and events, ensuring that you do not miss any vital information. It also supports the weather prediction for the last three days and can effortlessly control the music playback on your phone via Bluetooth.

full_description:
Udfine Watch GS Bluetooth Calling GPS Smartwatch

The Udfine Watch GS is a cutting-edge smartwatch with outstanding features that will improve your daily life. This watch comes with 1.38-inch HD display which ensure that the information can easily accessible and visible in any lighting condition. The Bluetooth calling capabilities, which allows users to make and receive calls right from the watch for the built-in microphone and speaker. This is one of the most notable features. The Amazon Alexa as a voice assistant adds another level of convenience, allowing users to manage music, receive directions, set alarms, and do other things using voice requests. The Udfine Watch GS has GPS feature which makes it a dependable companion for tracking activities like runs, walks, and treks. This smartwatch is water resistant to 50 meters and can be worn in the shower or pool, making it ideal for active people. With its double bands, the watch also enables style freedom, allowing customers to select the one that best complements their fashion tastes. However, while the Udfine Watch GS excels in many areas, its battery life may fall short of that of rival smartwatches, and occasional gaps in performance may occur. The Udfine Watch GS distinguishes out as a multipurpose and fashionable wearable smartwatch that combine technology and fashion in daily life.

5 Satellite Positioning System Strong And Accurate GPS Tracking

From riding through city streets to strolling through remote countryside, the Udfine Watch GS can pinpoint your location with precision thanks to compatibility for five satellite systems. The integrated GNSS chipset has improved performance for more precise position tracking. There are five primary global positioning systems supported: GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, QZSS, and BDS.

Mighty Battery Life

With a battery life of 35 days, you can experience energy beyond extinction with Udfine Watch GS. The watch also includes a new Endurance GPS battery mode for individuals who enjoy spending lengthy amounts of time in outdoors.

Bluetooth Calling To Free Your Hands

You may answer or reject incoming calls with a single tap on your watch when you're running outside or in other situations where taking out your phone isn't practical. This feature makes the user life easier.

A Prime Personal Online Assistant

Just give a command to your Udfine Watch GS Alexa will response quickly. With Alexa, you can easily set an alarm, ask a question, obtain a translation, and do other things.

Support 100+ Sport Modes

Fly into action quickly and easily with automatic recognition with outdoor running, indoor walking, outdoor walking, indoor running, elliptical, wowing machine. There are 100+ sports mood availbale with Udfine Watch GS.

5ATM Water resistance

Udfine Watch GS has 5ATM water resistance. This means it can endure water pressure equivalent to 50 meters. With the Udfine Watch GS, you can brave the rain, rule the pool, and conquer the ocean. By shaking the watch you can get out the water easily.

Health Monitoring Activity

The Udfine Watch GS is more than just a timepiece; it is also a comprehensive health monitoring companion. This smartwatch is jam-packed with functions to improve your health and fitness tracking capabilities. The Udfine Watch GS delivers significant insights into your everyday activities by monitoring your heart rate and sleep habits, tracking your steps, and calculating calories burned.
